2013.verse: وَضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ|And Allah sets forth|151|162|10063$مَثَلاً|a similitude|93|116|261$قَرْيَةً|(of) a town|96|119|10171$كَانَتْ|(that) was|91|114|888$ءَامِنَةً|secure|73|96|10172$مُّطْمَئِنَّةً|and content,|106|118|10173$يَأْتِيهَا|coming to it|99|110|10174$رِزْقُهَا|its provision|99|120|8371$رَغَدًا|(in) abundance|120|141|370$مِّن|from|50|71|53$كُلِّ|every|57|78|185$مَكَانٍ|place,|70|91|8082$فَكَفَرَتْ|but it denied|104|114|10175$بِأَنْعُمِ ٱللَّهِ|(the) Favors of Allah,|162|172|10176$فَأَذَٲقَهَا ٱللَّهُ|so Allah made it taste|165|186|10177$لِبَاسَ|(the) garb|88|109|10178$ٱلْجُوعِ|(of) the hunger|122|143|10179$وَٱلْخَوْفِ|and the fear|104|114|10180$بِمَا|for what|76|167|43$كَانُواْ|they used (to)|117|300|94$يَصْنَعُونَ|do.|107|198|4820$

2014.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|121|640$جَآءَهُمْ|came to them|112|140|853$رَسُولٌ|a Messenger|103|130|839$مِّنْهُمْ|from among them|135|162|730$فَكَذَّبُوهُ|but they denied him;|158|172|6500$فَأَخَذَهُمُ|so seized them|119|150|10181$ٱلْعَذَابُ|the punishment|122|184|827$وَهُمْ|while they|88|150|256$ظَـٰلِمُونَ|(were) wrongdoers.|150|181|505$

2015.verse: فَكُلُواْ|So eat|70|82|546$مِمَّا|of what|71|96|216$رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ|Allah has provided you -|181|206|5197$حَلَـٰلاً|lawful|70|95|1462$طَيِّبًا|and good.|86|111|1463$وَٱشْكُرُواْ|And be grateful|122|134|1350$نِعْمَتَ|(for the) Favor|119|136|1844$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah,|86|120|606$إِن|if|44|78|225$كُنتُمْ|[you]|60|94|214$إِيَّاهُ|Him Alone|84|118|5578$تَعْبُدُونَ|you worship.|104|121|1216$

2016.verse: إِنَّمَا|Only|55|67|102$حَرَّمَ|He has forbidden|131|154|1487$عَلَيْكُمُ|to you|79|102|534$ٱلْمَيْتَةَ|the dead animal|125|148|1488$وَٱلدَّمَ|and the blood|111|134|1489$وَلَحْمَ|and the flesh|107|119|1490$ٱلْخِنزِيرِ|(of) the swine,|119|131|1491$وَمَآ|and what|82|106|46$أُهِلَّ|has been dedicated|150|174|4732$لِغَيْرِ|to other (than)|121|145|1493$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|77|2$بِهِۦ‌ۖ|[with it].|79|91|204$فَمَنِ|But (if) one|96|107|1494$ٱضْطُرَّ|(is) forced -|101|123|1495$غَيْرَ|without (being)|122|144|560$بَاغٍ|disobedient,|100|122|1496$وَلَا|and not|71|93|25$عَادٍ|a transgressor -|127|138|1497$فَإِنَّ|then indeed,|103|146|599$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|139|184$غَفُورٌ|(is) Oft-Forgiving,|139|225|1499$رَّحِيمٌ|Most Merciful.|113|156|1294$

2017.verse: وَلَا|And (do) not|105|113|25$تَقُولُواْ|say|78|94|986$لِمَا|for that which|114|130|426$تَصِفُ|assert|80|96|10182$أَلْسِنَتُكُمُ|your tongues,|112|128|10183$ٱلْكَذِبَ|the lie,|81|97|3020$هَـٰذَا|"This|59|67|248$حَلَـٰلٌ|(is) lawful|85|94|10184$وَهَـٰذَا|and this|73|91|2989$حَرَامٌ|(is) forbidden,"|118|136|10185$لِّتَفْتَرُواْ|so that you invent|143|161|10186$عَلَى|about|63|81|52$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|71|606$ٱلْكَذِبَ‌ۚ|the lie.|81|90|3020$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|98|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|145|20$يَفْتَرُونَ|invent|91|147|2726$عَلَى|about|63|119|52$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|109|606$ٱلْكَذِبَ|the lie,|81|109|3020$لَا يُفْلِحُونَ|they will not succeed.|167|167|8224$

2019.verse: وَعَلَى|And to|77|87|67$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|108|20$هَادُواْ|are Jews|78|97|617$حَرَّمْنَا|We have forbidden|144|163|4629$مَا|what|53|72|262$قَصَصْنَا|We related|98|117|10187$عَلَيْكَ|to you|71|81|2245$مِن قَبْلُ‌ۖ|before.|92|105|250$وَمَا|And not|72|98|46$ظَلَمْنَـٰهُمْ|We wronged them|140|166|8731$وَلَـٰكِن|but|78|104|108$كَانُوٓاْ|they used (to)|117|143|94$أَنفُسَهُمْ|themselves|94|107|87$يَظْلِمُونَ|wrong.|98|98|543$

2012.verse: On the Day when every soul will come disputing for itself, and every soul will be fully compensated for what it did, and they will not be wronged.

2013.verse: And Allah presents an example: a city which was safe and secure, its provision coming to it in abundance from every location, but it denied the favors of Allah. So Allah made it taste the envelopment of hunger and fear for what they had been doing.

2014.verse: And there had certainly come to them a Messenger from among themselves, but they denied him; so punishment overtook them while they were wrongdoers.

2015.verse: Then eat of what Allah has provided for you [which is] lawful and good. And be grateful for the favor of Allah, if it is [indeed] Him that you worship.

2016.verse: He has only forbidden to you dead animals, blood, the flesh of swine, and that which has been dedicated to other than Allah. But whoever is forced [by necessity], neither desiring [it] nor transgressing [its limit] - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

2017.verse: And do not say about what your tongues assert of untruth, "This is lawful and this is unlawful," to invent falsehood about Allah. Indeed, those who invent falsehood about Allah will not succeed.

2018.verse: [It is but] a brief enjoyment, and they will have a painful punishment.

2019.verse: And to those who are Jews We have prohibited that which We related to you before. And We did not wrong them [thereby], but they were wronging themselves.
